itunes:title: EPISODE 260: The Purge Laws Have Begun
title: EPISODE 260: The Purge Laws Have Begun
description:
PURGE LAWS ARE HERE! Beginning January 1, 2023, 2nd degree murder suspects will be released without bail in Illinois in the name of social reform; arson, kidnapping, drug induced homincide, and 9 other types of crime will be considered non-detainable at the start of the new year. Idaho tax dollars are funding a Boise drag show for kids (aka grooming); however, some businesses have begun to pull their funding from the event after citizens began calling to let them know children were the target audience. Oregon saw a 216% spike in overdoses just one year after decriminalizing hard drugs in order to provide relief to drug addicts in their recovery; turns out, decriminalizing hard drugs only enables drug addicts. Senator Roger Marshall is playing footsies with the left as he hints that he’s in favor of amnesty for illegal immigrants; Poso analyzes why we can’t risk increasing immigration during inflation.  



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO
